text:
A good place for locals and tourists (even for vegans and vegetarians) to get almost anything.
Merlion stuff is also available at this supermarket. Happy Shopping.

I like how Cold Storage takes pride in the quality of the food that they display. Many staff were still stocking up the shelves when the store opened.

There are many items on offer and I managed to get the chocolates at $0.69 instead of $2.75 and the coffee ground which has a reasonable expiry of a little more than one month was at half price of $8.45.

I could not find a trolley, and I was directed to one. The cashier was all smiles, asked for Yuu rewards and assisted me to pack my items into my bag. She immediately scanned the heavily items so that I could bag at the bottom first.

Very worst service of salad boxes.. there is inexperienced person don’t know how to fill the box.. the quantity very less paid 6sgd+2sgd protein(only 3 small pieces chicken) penne(only 7 pieces) grain is the main. Previously was good quantity now the quantity how much to fill they don’t know properly
We went shopping to Cold Storage to buy Christmas goodies. Jes who had already finished his shift went above and beyond helping us find our goods. Truly grateful for the extra help

Deli and salad section is generally great- minus the very grumpy staff who is obviously overworked as he exclaimed "there is only me" when I was just asking if there will be anyone helping me. Please DFI, look into your staffing to have more manpower during lunch time, or don't have the deli section opened. It was fully decked out with food but no staff to serve.
